code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItem=_ref=>{let{item,updateQuantity,removeFromCart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateQuantity(item._id,item.quantity-1),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" Quantity: ",item.quantity," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateQuantity(item._id,item.quantity+1),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item._id),children:"Remove from Cart"})]});};export default CartItem;
